definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: beat off, beat out (NH id.; strike, beat, Ar. xabat.a, Aram. h.bat., [[חֲבַט]])—

beat out (grain), Gideon [[חׂבֵט חִטִּים בַּגַּת]] Ju Jdg 6:11, so Ru 2:17, of small quantities;—distinct fr. threshing on open floor, with cattle; fig. of ´[[י]]'s judgment, and subsequent gathering of Isr. Is 27:12 (no obj. expr.), so Che Di Du; Ges Hi Kn Brd place sub
